full_text: The nation’s first large-scale offshore wind farm has received its final federal approval, foreshadowing a potential new energy industry on the Atlantic Coast https://t.co/FBIxTymvwh

localize.full_text: 米国初の大規模な洋上風力発電所が連邦政府の最終承認を受け、大西洋岸の新たなエネルギー産業の可能性を予感させています。https://t.co/FBIxTymvwh
